page.title: 03New Fritchley School
page.content: Today Fritchley has a C. E. Primary School with nearly 100 children in 4 classes. It is fairly new and quite large with a playground and a playing field. The lessons we have are Maths, Handwriting, English, Reading, Art and Craft, Science, Topic, Story, PE (floorwork or apparatus) and our own personal topics. We watch a TV programme called "Science Workshop". On Wednesdays we have singing practice and games outside. When it is a dry playtime you can play anything you want. We play Elastics, Tik, Stuck-in-the-Mud, Spider, Gluepot and Football. During wet playtimes you have to read a book, play indoor games or draw a picture.At dinner time 2 dinner Ladies put your food out on the plates. The food is cooked in the canteen so it is fresh and hot.
